text: Hi tom I struggle with slack notifications too. They never appear!  So you could create one reel and stick the best pieces of anim on it and do a rig breakdown at the end. There's nothing wrong with using someone else's rig. After all that's what you'd be doing as a working animator.
So are you going for quite stylised facial anim along the lines of what you sent me already? I think it's a good opportunity to show off your skills
